comment:
* Unchecked exception thrown when the argument corresponding to the format * specifier is of an incompatible type. * *

Unless otherwise specified, passing a {@code null} argument to any * method or constructor in this class will cause a {@link * NullPointerException} to be thrown. * * @since 1.5

methods.name: public char getConversion()
methods.comment:
* Returns the inapplicable conversion.
     *
     * @return  The inapplicable conversion

methods.name: public Class<?> getArgumentClass()
methods.comment:
* Returns the class of the mismatched argument.
     *
     * @return   The class of the mismatched argument
